page.title: 03The Contented Milkman
page.content: Mr Doig has been a milkman for 37 years.He rises at 3:30am each morning to deliver 2500 bottles of milk to his 900 customers.He sells other products like rolls,yoghurt,juices,cream,eggs, butter and even potatoes.The advantage of being a milkman is that you have the whole world to yourself so early in the morning.Mr Doig does not mind icy roads but he hates snow as it's easy to get stranded up a side road when there's a lot of snow.Breakdowns are a nuisance too when you are anxious to get the milk delivered on time.It is a family business with his wife,son and daughter all delivering milk.They take great pride in being effeciant and reliable.He is not too bothered about supermarkets selling milk.
